name: Lonely Mountain
description:
An hunter climbs down to search for his missing friend. Someone else looks for important resources. Two points of view will observe the same events.

Content Warning: Spiders, Swearing

== Instructions ==

This game is a Visual Novel.

 - You can advance text with Space, Enter, or Mouse Click.

 - Select options with the numbers 1 through 4.

 - You can pause with Escape
